title: unlimited calls
info:
unlimited calls hello by hello  For 1 day at the price of 10 Afghanis. 
To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. 
To activate, send A UD and to deactivate D UD to 740

title: 15 minutes daily
info:
15 minutes calls to all Afghan networks for  1 day for 25 Afghanis. 
Press the green button to activate and red button to deactivate. 
To activate A OD and to deactivate D send OD to 740

title: 60 minutes daily
info:
60 minutes for 1 day at the price of 20 Afghanis.  
Press the green button to activate and red button to deactivate. 
Send A 20 to activate and D 20 to deactivate to 740

title: 200 minutes per day
info:
200 minutes for  1 day for 30 Afghani.  
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate.  
To activate A 30 and to deactivate D 30 send to 740

title: 300 daily minutes
info:
300 minutes for 1 day at the price of 45 Afghanis.  
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate.  
To activate A 50 and to deactivate D 50 send to 740
